title: Lovingly cared for, describes this 1,860 sq. ft. -2 bedroom unit
posting_body: Beautiful Historic Renovation in the French Fort Community of Memphis.
The former U.S. Marine Hospital underwent a full renovation transforming it into 71 unique upscale apartments.
Listed on the National Register of Historic Places, the oldest of the 3 buildings was built in 1884.
The 3 acre campus like atmosphere overlooks Chickasaw Heritage Park, Native American burial mounds, Chickasaw Bluff, and the winding Mississippi River.
FOR MORE INFORMATION, PLEASE CALL OR TEXT TODAY:
Lovingly cared for, describes this 1,860 sq.
ft. -2 bedroom unit in Manor Woods.
Upon entering the foyer, there is an additional 282 sq.
ft. for an office, den or other possibilities.
An open floor plan completes the next level with a living room, dining room, kitchen with a center island, pantry & 1/2 bath.
The upper floor has Primary bedroom with a cathedral ceiling, large window & walk-in closet.
Also a 2 bedroom, bath and laundry.
The full bath has been remodeled with Jack & Jill sinks topped with Carrara marble and Shaker cabinets.
Brazilian hardwood floors, shadow box and Ultra special window moldings are found throughout this unit.
The Hunter Douglas window treatments are to remain.
Decks are being replaced, centrally located near I-84, shopping and restaurants.
